column1: Defined our index case. Patient with cough and fever for a week resistant to symptomatic and antibiotic home therapy. The patient goes to the Ps with respiratory failure. History not indicative for direct contact with suspicious cases. It turns out after being employed by a hotel.
The HRTC framework is indicated by us as highly suspicious for bilateral COVID-19 pneumonia. The suspicion is subsequently confirmed by the positivity of the pharyngeal swab.
